title: Small change to bus routes 40 and 44
articleContent:
From 23 June 2019, there'll be some minor changes to the timetable for routes 40 and 44 to better reflect traffic conditions and give you more reliable information about running times.

View the timetable for Route 40 Traralgon via Cross's Road. 

View the timetable for Route 44 Traralgon via Ellavale Drive. 

To plan your journey, visit Journey planner. To order a printed copy of a timetable, call 1800 800 007.
articleText: From 23 June 2019, there'll be some minor changes to the timetable for routes 40 and 44 to better reflect traffic conditions and give you more reliable information about running times.View the timetable for Route 40 Traralgon via Cross's Road. View the timetable for Route 44 Traralgon via Ellavale Drive. To plan your journey, visit Journey planner. To order a printed copy of a timetable, call 1800 800 007.
articleDescription: Description of changes to bus routes 40 and 44
